purpose: Facilitate coordination and management of multi-agent systems for complex task execution
principle: Builds on multi-agent reinforcement learning (MARL) to enable cooperative strategies among agents
reusability: Offers a flexible framework for defining and training multi-agent systems, with support for custom environments
limitations: Primarily experimental with limited support for real-world deployment, requires significant computational resources
name: cooragent
highlight: Unique focus on coordination strategies in multi-agent reinforcement learning environments
